title: Find lines with 'avonturen'
description: Find all lines in the file 'data/sample_doc.txt' that contain the word 'avonturen'.
man_page_info:
grep - searches for PATTERNS in each FILE.
Example: grep [OPTIONS] PATTERN [FILE...].
Key options: -i (ignore case), -v (invert match), -r (recursive), -n (line numbers).

input_details.prompt_for_command: Enter the grep command to find lines with 'avonturen':

evaluation.expected_stdout:
This line contains the word avonturen.
More avonturen can be found if you look closely.
The end of the avonturen in this document.

hints: Remember to specify the word you are searching for and the file to search in.
The basic syntax is 'grep PATTERN FILENAME'.
